summary: A letter from the U.S. Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York to the Metropolitan Detention Center's Legal Department, transmitting a hard drive containing discovery materials for the case United States v. Ghislaine Maxwell. The letter is signed by Acting U.S. Attorney Audrey Strauss.

persons.name: Ghislaine Maxwell
persons.context: The subject of the criminal case (20 Cr. 330) for which discovery materials are being transmitted.

persons.name: Audrey Strauss
persons.context: The signatory of the letter, transmitting discovery materials in the Ghislaine Maxwell case.

locations: Silvio J. Motto Building, One Saint Andrew's Plaza, New York, New York 10007
Metropolitan Detention Center, 80 29th Street, Brooklyn, NY 11232
keyFacts: The document is a formal transmittal of discovery materials for the criminal case United States v. Ghislaine Maxwell (20 Cr. 330).
The materials were sent on November 9, 2020, from the U.S. Attorney's Office to the Metropolitan Detention Center where Maxwell was likely held.
The discovery materials were contained on a hard drive.
Audrey Strauss was the Acting U.S. Attorney for the Southern District of New York at the time.
